column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Massive slices of dense sourdough bread were the star of the breakfast sandwich
column2: in the sense that they were the best part
column3: and also the sense that they were the main thing going on with the sandwich.  Bread was James Franco to the rest of the sandwich's General Hospital - kind of wonderful
column5: kind of too much.  If anyone in Houston could dispense with the other ingredients and get away with $4 artisanal toast a la The Mill in SF
